mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_shop (name, tel, registerTime, state, address, logo, admin_id) VALUES ( #{name}, #{tel}, #{registerTime}, #{state}, #{address}, #{logo}, #{admin.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_shop SET name=#{name}, tel=#{tel}, registerTime=#{registerTime}, state=#{state}, address=#{address}, logo=#{logo}, admin_id=#{admin.id} WHERE id=#{id}
